name: Royse Law Firm
overview: Royse Law Firm provides transactional tax, business and corporate law services to closely held, emerging growth and middle market companies as well as to private equity, angel and venture funds. Our clients include companies in the technology and alternative energy sectors as well as more traditional businesses such as food services, food processing, real estate and manufacturing. Many of our clients are multi-national companies. For example, many of our clients have their principal manufacturing facilities in Asia, while development is handled out of India, and distribution is conducted throughout Europe and the United States. We also focus on closely held and family businesses (which range from small to large) due to their unique need for integrated legal solutions that emphasize tax efficiencies. Our tax expertise is the common thread that runs throughout our practice and distinguishes Royse Law Firm from other general business firms. We frequently advise other law firms on tax aspects of their corporate, real estate, and commercial transactions and provide tax advice to litigation attorneys in various contexts, including the taxation of recoveries and professional liability. Finally, we are experienced in the negotiation of mergers and acquisitions (M&A), corporate equity and debt financings, and partnership and joint venture transactions.
